rules_text:
Flying
Whenever Prioleau's Flagship attacks, you get {E}, then you may pay {E}{E}{E}. If you do, Prioleau's Flagship gets +3/+0 until end of turn, then it deals 3 damage to any target.
Tap an untapped creature you control with power 3 or greater: Prioleau's Flagship becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.
